alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 2:35PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...VERY COLD TEMPERATURES POSSIBLE THIS EVENING... Under nearly clear skies and light winds, temperatures are expected to drop quickly after sunset this evening, with minimum temperatures in the mid 20s likely by 8 pm or 9 pm. However, temperatures will begin to warm shortly thereafter as a southerly flow takes over and clouds begin increasing...and the amount of time that temperatures will be at or below 27 degrees is expected to be short (generally an hour or less). Precautions for protecting people, pets, plants and pipes will need to be maintained into the evening, but impacts are expected to be minimal, especially when compared to recent nights during this current cold snap, as conditions will be improving through the late evening and overnight hours.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry
